charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. (FELON IN POSSESSION OF FIREARM)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for a total term of Three months. THE ORIGINAL TERM OF SUPERVISED RELEASE OF THIRTY-SIX MONTHS REMAINS IN PLACE AND EXPIRES ON DECEMBER 11, 2017. THE SAME CONDITIONS ALSO APPLY (SEE SHEET 3A). IN ADDITION, AS A SPECIAL CONDITION OF SUPERVISED RELEASE:..DEFENDANT IS TO BE PLACED IN A RESIDENTIAL DRUG ABUSE TREATMENT FACILITY FOR SIX (6) MONTHS.
